title: FS: Gandil EPDG (double name), Cassidy AB, Davidson Cycle and Irv Young EX

posts.post_title: FS: Gandil EPDG (double name), Cassidy AB, Davidson Cycle and Irv Young EX
posts.post_content:
Up for grabs is a:

Chick Gandil with tough EPDG back and a double name at top of card It is a slight miscut with some of his name at the top. SGC 20.  Asking SOLD

Davidson Cycle back SGC 20 asking SOLD

Cassidy American Beauty Back SGC 20 SOLD

Irv Young raw Piedmont Back. Super nice, sharp corners and not altered should get a nice number grad.  Asking $38

Paypal f/f and add $2.00 to ship!
I'll take Gandil if available. Pm coming
